axiosError.ECONNABORTED: The connection was aborted. Please try again.
axiosError.ERR_BAD_OPTION: A bad option was provided. Please verify your settings and try again.
axiosError.ERR_BAD_OPTION_VALUE: An invalid option value was provided. Please check your settings and try again.
axiosError.ERR_BAD_REQUEST: There was an issue with your request. Please verify and try again.
axiosError.ERR_BAD_RESPONSE: We received an unexpected response from the server. Please try again later.
axiosError.ERR_CANCELED: Your request has been canceled. Please try again if this was a mistake.
axiosError.ERR_DEPRECATED: This feature is no longer supported. Please contact support for assistance.
axiosError.ERR_FR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS: We're experiencing too many redirects. Please try again later.
axiosError.ERR_INVALID_URL: The provided URL is invalid. Please check and try again.
axiosError.ERR_NETWORK: We are experiencing network issues. Please check your connection and try again.
axiosError.ERR_NOT_SUPPORT: This feature is not supported at the moment. Please contact support for further information.
axiosError.ETIMEDOUT: The request timed out. Please check your connection and try again.

common.error403Description: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this page.
common.error404Description:
The page you are looking was moved, removed,
renamed, or might never exist!

login.usernameRetrievalError: Unable to retrieve username. Please log in again.
